statements: SELECT id, notification_name, notification_message, geofence_polygon FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT notification_message, notification_name, geofence_polygon, id FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT notification_name, id, geofence_polygon FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT geofence_polygon, notification_name FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT notification_name, geofence_polygon, id, notification_message FROM geofencing_notifications;
SELECT notification_name, notification_message FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678' LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_notifications ORDER BY notification_name DESC, id;
SELECT notification_name, ST_AsText(geofence_polygon) FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE ST_Area(geofence_polygon) > 1000;
SELECT notification_name, notification_message FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE notification_name ILIKE '%important%' AND geofence_polygon = 'POLYGON((0 0, 0 10, 10 10, 10 0, 0 0))';

SELECT notification_name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(geofence_polygon)) AS centroid_x, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(geofence_polygon)) AS centroid_y FROM geofencing_notifications WHERE ST_Area(geofence_polygon) > 1000 ORDER BY centroid_x, centroid_y DESC;
SELECT geofence_id, geofence_name, geofence_area, alert_radius FROM geofence_locations;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations ORDER BY geofence_id DESC;
SELECT geofence_name, alert_radius FROM geofence_locations WHERE alert_radius > 50;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM user_locations WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_locations ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT geofence_id, geofence_name FROM geofence_locations WHERE alert_radius > 50 ORDER BY geofence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_locations WHERE alert_radius < 30 ORDER BY geofence_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, last_updated FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_name, user_location.STAsText() AS location_text FROM user_locations WHERE ST_Distance(user_location, 'POINT(10 20)') < 1000;
SELECT geofence_name, ST_AREA(geofence_area) AS area_size FROM geofence_locations WHERE ST_DWithin(geofence_area, 'POLYGON((0 0, 0 10, 10 10, 10 0, 0 0))', 5)
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT id, name FROM locations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, ST_AsText(boundary) FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE name = 'Home';
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, boundary FROM geofences ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name AS geofence_name, COUNT(id) AS geofence_count FROM geofences GROUP BY name;
SELECT l.name AS location_name, n.message AS notification_message FROM locations l INNER JOIN notifications n ON l.id = n.location_id;
SELECT id, ST_AsText(coordinates) FROM locations WHERE ST_DWithin(coordinates, 'POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)', 1000);
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, area FROM geofence_areas WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE triggered_at < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, area FROM geofence_areas WHERE name LIKE 'Central%';
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, area FROM geofence_areas WHERE ST_Distance(area, 'POINT(-74.0059 40.7128)'::geography) < 10000;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_geofence_areas, MAX(created_at) AS latest_created FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT id, area_name FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, message, timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(geo_polygon) FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_type, timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, user_id, ST_AsText(location), timestamp FROM user_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
